Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Convoy looked back at Kup and Ygg, but he could not understand why they were 
ignoring him. Suddenly he felt a slight tremble and soon the trembling became 
a punding, which then became a booming like thunder... He slowly turned to see 
a gigantic pair of teeth reflecting his own face back at him, startled he 
fell backwards as grimlock in his new form roared loud enough to send a ripple 
through the sheild... The dino looked over the bots until his eyes fell on 
Jackie... He transformed and placed a hand against the sheild. In his robot form 
his chest and head looked the same as the old dino-bot, but everything else had 
been updated, hydrolics, and muscle like cables intertwined around parts of 
his arms and the rex's tail was stiff and lance like in his hand. "WheelJack?" 
The bot looked at him, but shook his head and transformed back into the Dino 
and lowered himself growling to their eye level. "Leave... or you will be 
destroyed."

--part1_179.1b2b0bcc.2c0e0ab1_boundary
